rows.label: tlk70000025_01_msg0001
rows.name: You all off to Gula, then?

rows.label: tlk70000025_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Before you head out, you should check
out all the glowy whiteish spots around
each area.

rows.label: tlk70000025_01_msg0003
rows.name:
You can get some pretty rad items from
those, and they tend to be different
kinds depending on the location.

rows.label: tlk70000025_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Near rocks you'll find minerals, near
water, fish. Insects in the desert, plants
and fruit in grasslands. See the logic?

rows.label: tlk70000025_01_msg0005
rows.name:
So you gotta look in the right kinda
place for the right kinda material,
ya dig?
